title: First Brands Aims to Assure Lenders by Chasing Trapped Funds
description: First Brands advisers sought to reassure skittish creditors after the value of its $1.1 billion rescue loan collapsed, saying business has stabilized since filing Chapter 11 and moving to unlock funds from receivables it can’t currently access.
content: First Brands advisers sought to reassure skittish creditors after the value of its $1.1 billion rescue loan collapsed, saying business has stabilized since filing Chapter 11 and moving to unlock funds from receivables it can’t currently access.
